PlaceMeNet was founded with a simple pro: PlaceMeNet was founded with a simple promise: simplify recruitment for fast-growing teams and remove the friction job seekers face when chasing their next career milestone. From curated roles to real-time coaching, we fuse technology with a human touch to build careers that matter.
PlacemeNet is committed to worker protec: PlacemeNet is committed to worker protection. Follow these rules and share them with your friends and family applying overseas.
We never charge registration fees, sell: We never charge registration fees, sell visas, or take worker commission. Anyone asking for money in our name is a scam.
Do not send money via cash, bank, Easypa: Do not send money via cash, bank, Easypaisa, JazzCash, WhatsApp, or crypto. Genuine employers handle costs legally.
Collect a written offer, company license: Collect a written offer, company license, visa document, and detailed contract before you travel. Contact us if anything looks suspicious.
PlacemeNet does not operate via TikTok,: PlacemeNet does not operate via TikTok, Telegram, or random WhatsApp agents. Trust only @placemenet.net emails or the website chat.
Feel unsafe? Email :support or :legal. W: Feel unsafe? Email :support or :legal. We block offenders and report them to authorities.

Violations lead to permanent bans becaus: Violations lead to permanent bans because we protect both workers and reputable employers.
